name: Legacy (Aiden_217)
description:
Legacy is currently in 2 different versions. We are testing the grounds for each build type as they are currently proof of concepts.

A terrible fate has fallen upon The Land! A dragon has awoken and is causing havoc, terrorising townsfolk and burning down villages. Your father, a famous hero, left to go slay the dragon and end the bane. However, He was tragically killed by the dragon and now you must live up to the Legacy left behind by him and follow in his footsteps.

Will you be able to take up weapons a live up to your father's legacy?
